9	This file is copied from: https://github.com/kyrus/python-junit-xml/blob/master/junit_xml/__init__.py

16	This file is licensed under the MIT license: https://github.com/kyrus/python-junit-xml/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
17	
18	Based on the understanding of what Jenkins can parse for JUnit XML files.
19	
20	<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
21	<testsuites errors="1" failures="1" tests="4" time="45">
22	    <testsuite errors="1" failures="1" hostname="localhost" id="0" name="test1"
23	               package="testdb" tests="4" timestamp="2012-11-15T01:02:29">
24	        <properties>
25	            <property name="assert-passed" value="1"/>
26	        </properties>
27	        <testcase classname="testdb.directory" name="1-passed-test" time="10"/>
28	        <testcase classname="testdb.directory" name="2-failed-test" time="20">
29	            <failure message="Assertion FAILED: failed assert" type="failure">
30	                the output of the testcase
31	            </failure>
32	        </testcase>
33	        <testcase classname="package.directory" name="3-errord-test" time="15">
34	            <error message="Assertion ERROR: error assert" type="error">
35	                the output of the testcase
36	            </error>
37	        </testcase>
38	        <testcase classname="package.directory" name="3-skipped-test" time="0">
39	            <skipped message="SKIPPED Test" type="skipped">
40	                the output of the testcase
41	            </skipped>
42	        </testcase>
43	        <testcase classname="testdb.directory" name="3-passed-test" time="10">
44	            <system-out>
45	                I am system output
46	            </system-out>
47	            <system-err>
48	                I am the error output
49	            </system-err>
50	        </testcase>
51	    </testsuite>
52	</testsuites>
53	"""
